about.details:
Headquartered in Gujarat, Quality RO Industries is engaged in the following areas:

  1. Manufacturing of water softener equipment,
  2. Contract manufacturing,
  3. Trading of RO equipment spares and associated products,
  4. Contractual logistics to local infrastructure and manufacturing companies.

As of November 30, 2021, the company has an installed capacity of (i) 70,000 units for Filters, 17,000 units for RO Bowl, and 25,000 units for RO Housing. The company has 7 employees at the registered office including its directors.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Experienced management and dedicated employee base
  • Repeat orders for satisfied customers
  • Strong relationships with suppliers, ensuring quality and timely supplies of raw materials
  • Cost-effective production and timely fulfilment of orders

faqs.question: What is the Quality RO IPO?
faqs.answer:
Quality RO IPO is a SME IPO of 530000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹2.70 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹51 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on January 27, 2022, and closes on February 1, 2022.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Quality RO IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Quality RO IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Quality RO IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Quality RO IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Quality RO IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Quality RO IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Quality RO IPO opens on January 27, 2022 and closes on February 1, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Quality RO IPO?
faqs.answer: Quality RO IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,02,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Quality RO IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Quality RO IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Quality RO IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Quality RO IPO will be done on Friday, February 4, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, February 8, 2022. Check the Quality RO IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Quality RO IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Quality RO IPO listing date is on Wednesday, February 9, 2022.
